All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DtoService
DtoService is called by the TourGuideController to generate JSON.
InternalTestHelper
Class to manage the userTest generation.
InternalUserFactory
Bean factory to generate the in memory pool of Users.
NearAttractionDto
Dto model to constitute the NearAttractionListDto for the getNearbyAttractions method into the TourGuideController.
NearAttractionsListDto
Dto model to meet the getNearbyAttractions method into the TourGuideController.
RewardsService
Service class to perform rewards treatments
TourguideApplication
The application class.
TourGuideController
The Api controller.
TourGuideModule
Configuration class to call required Beans.
TourGuideService
Service class to perform user treatments.
Tracker
Class to manage the tracker thread.
TripDealsDto
Dto model to meet the getTripDeals method into the TourGuideController.
User
The model to represent user and store locations, rewards, preferences, and personal's information.
UserLocationDto
Dto model to meet the getLocation method into the TourGuideController.
UserPreferences
Model to store preferences of the user.
UserReward
Model to represent a reward.
UserRewardsDto
Dto model to meet the getRewards method into the TourGuideController.
UserService
Class to perform business treatments for Users.
